translated: Moreover, Vishnu himself created the goddesses through his prayers, Brahma created the goddesses through the power of his practice, and the powerful Shiva created the goddesses through the increase of his own radiance, which was created by the gathering of the radiance of other flowers and the movement of his passionate mind.
